title: Minuteman Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Pizzeria, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Owner is from Boston. Will exchange cheese for another topping. Huge range of pizzas. Many vegetarian options can be made without cheese. English and Spanish spoken. Good for vegan food in what can sometimes be difficult Uyuni. Directions: there is no sign outside, just enter Hotel Tonito and ask. Restaurant is in the back room.
